subject: ORDER #SSN4585
description_text:
Hi,

I just wanted to find out if you knew roughly when the shifter is likely to be shipped for order #SSN4585.

Thanks,
Mark

conversations.body_text: Hi mark steff,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047154893171,SF6047209528735
